posts.postText:
you know him the admin he got stuff happened blahblah cut to the chase, he wasnt on the server when it happened so i dont have his steam id but if you see him this might help you find out his name 

Never tell your password to anyone.
Monday, August 23, 2010
3:00 PM - [NNJG]Spartans445{TRE}: hi you shit  bag

3:09 PM - [NNJG]Crausidia(FD): oh... hi zack
3:09 PM - [NNJG]Spartans445{TRE}: fuck youy
3:09 PM - [NNJG]Crausidia(FD): why?
3:09 PM - [NNJG]Spartans445{TRE}: because
3:09 PM - [NNJG]Crausidia(FD): ?
3:09 PM - [NNJG]Crausidia(FD): please explain
3:09 PM - [NNJG]Spartans445{TRE}: of wat u said
3:10 PM - [NNJG]Crausidia(FD): ?
3:10 PM - [NNJG]Crausidia(FD): what? i say alot of things
3:11 PM - [NNJG]Spartans445{TRE}: ben told me u said im a piece of shit good for nothing loser that does not know how to play gmod and i should not use steam
3:11 PM - [NNJG]Crausidia(FD): ???
3:11 PM - [NNJG]Crausidia(FD): i think ben was joking
3:11 PM - [NNJG]Crausidia(FD): i seriously have no clue what your taking about
3:12 PM - [NNJG]Spartans445{TRE}: well he was not joking he said
3:12 PM - [NNJG]Crausidia(FD): why would i say somthing like that if i hardly know you and have no hates against you?
3:12 PM - [NNJG]Spartans445{TRE}: well thats not wat ben says
3:13 PM - [NNJG]Crausidia(FD): you would beleive some one to say if some one knows another person or not?
3:14 PM - [NNJG]Spartans445{TRE}: well i did not think u hated me ben told me not to ask you about it
3:14 PM - [NNJG]Crausidia(FD): ? why is saying stuff to make my self esteem drop about 30 mroe %
3:15 PM - [NNJG]Spartans445{TRE}: im just telling  u wat ben said tring to be a good friend
3:16 PM - [NNJG]Crausidia(FD): i never said that, what should i do email him and ask him about this if its true or not?
3:16 PM - [NNJG]Crausidia(FD): HMMMM
[NNJG]Spartans445{TRE} has changed their name to [TRE]Spartans445.
3:16 PM - [TRE]Spartans445: hell deny it
3:16 PM - [NNJG]Crausidia(FD): your probally just lying to make me feel bad about somthing that never happened to make me be better friends with you
3:16 PM - [TRE]Spartans445: to make it look like im lieng
3:16 PM - [NNJG]Crausidia(FD): i know ben he wouldnt do that
3:17 PM - [TRE]Spartans445: well then I guess you dont know him good enough then
3:17 PM - [NNJG]Crausidia(FD): you dont know him good enough then >:C
3:18 PM - [TRE]Spartans445: well I know now that he starts shit
3:18 PM - [NNJG]Crausidia(FD): is that so? why do you claim to be jesus?
3:18 PM - [TRE]Spartans445: i dont
3:19 PM - [NNJG]Crausidia(FD): i checked your aliase
3:19 PM - [TRE]Spartans445: thats my name in disquise
3:19 PM - [NNJG]Crausidia(FD): it said Jesus
3:19 PM - [NNJG]Crausidia(FD): spell Disguised right
3:19 PM - [TRE]Spartans445: so stop going off topic
3:19 PM - [NNJG]Crausidia(FD): mr.not in nnjg anymore
3:20 PM - [TRE]Spartans445: ya
3:20 PM - [TRE]Spartans445:  fuck them

3:21 PM - [TRE]Spartans445: random**
3:21 PM - [NNJG]Crausidia(FD): 3:18 PM - [TRE]Spartans445: i dont
3:19 PM - [NNJG]Crausidia(FD): i checked your aliase
3:19 PM - [TRE]Spartans445: thats my name in disquise
3:19 PM - [NNJG]Crausidia(FD): it said Jesus
3:19 PM - [NNJG]Crausidia(FD): spell Disguised right
3:19 PM - [TRE]Spartans445: so stop going off topic
3:19 PM - [NNJG]Crausidia(FD): mr.not in nnjg anymore

3:20 PM - [TRE]Spartans445: fuck them
3:21 PM - [TRE]Spartans445: ?
3:22 PM - [NNJG]Crausidia(FD): idk
3:22 PM - [NNJG]Crausidia(FD): have you heard of email?
3:22 PM - [TRE]Spartans445: waat so i guess your going to post that or something/ Right
3:22 PM - [NNJG]Crausidia(FD): yeah infact im postign the entire chat
3:22 PM - [TRE]Spartans445: wait untill they turn against you someday
3:22 PM - [NNJG]Crausidia(FD): your just saying i said that because your mad at ben and me
3:23 PM - [TRE]Spartans445: i was extremlly loyal to them and they did this to me

also i have sent a file to ben as proof

Brando, I have a feeling that you posted that just because you wanted to... lol.

Anyway, yeah, he was calling NNJG a "Faggot Clan" on his little steam group thing that he made me admin on for no reason.
He's getting a permanent ban from all our servers, for being a minge/trolling/flaming.
